metadata.title: Zohal ‚Äî Document Workflow IDE for Regulated Work
metadata.description: Turn messy PDFs into verified variables and decision packs you can confidently forward. Built for regulated workflows: evidence, review, and enterprise boundaries.

brand.name: Zohal
brand.tagline: The AI studio for regulated documents.

hero.headline: The AI studio for regulated documents.
hero.subhead: Drop contracts, invoices, portal exports, scans, and attachments ‚Äî Arabic or English ‚Äî and produce verified variables and decision packs with evidence you can forward.
hero.proofLine: Citations + visual grounding ‚Ä¢ Provisional ‚Üí Finalized ‚Ä¢ Exception-first workflow

problem.title: Document work is where risk hides.
body: Teams are drowning in PDFs, scans, email attachments, and portal exports. The cost shows up as re-reading, re-typing, inconsistent decisions, and missed deadlines ‚Äî while sensitive text leaks into public tools.
Zohal makes document AI governable and worth it: repeatable workflows, verified variables with receipts, and deliverables that survive scrutiny.

howItWorks.title: From messy PDFs to decision packs.
howItWorks.subhead: A workflow IDE: structured inputs ‚Üí verified variables ‚Üí repeatable steps ‚Üí clean outputs.

steps.title: Ingest + Understand
steps.body: OCR + layout parsing for Arabic/English, tables, stamps, signatures, scans.

steps.title: Verify Variables
steps.body: Every key field becomes a Verification Object: claim, citations, visual grounding, confidence, version history.

steps.title: Run Templates + Ship
steps.body: Checks, discrepancies, exception queues, approvals ‚Äî then export a forwardable Decision Pack.

stats.footnote: Performance varies by document quality and workflow checks.

tabs.label: Verification Objects
tabs.title: Verified variables with receipts.
bullets: Structured claims with citations + visual grounding

tabs.label: Discrepancies & Exceptions
tabs.title: Conflict-first, exception-driven workflow.
bullets: ‚ÄúNot found / unsupported‚Äù routes to exceptions automatically
Humans focus on disputes, not re-checking everything

tabs.label: Playbook Builder
tabs.title: Schema-first workflows ‚Äî not free-form prompts.
bullets: Outputs (memo sections, trackers, evidence map, exports)

tabs.label: Decision Packs
tabs.title: Forwardable deliverables, every time.
bullets: One-click exports: PDF / CSV / JSON + finalized snapshot

tabs.label: Governance
tabs.title: Adoption without chaos.
bullets: Audit exports tied to verified variables
Enterprise tenant isolation with dedicated boundaries

applications.title: Applications that sell ‚Äî on one platform.

cards.title: Contracts
cards.subtitle: Review, obligations, diligence ‚Äî fast and defensible.
bullets: Parties, term, renewal, termination, liability, governing law

cards.title: Compliance & Governance
cards.subtitle: Adopt AI without turning teams into auditors.
bullets: Audit exports tied to verified variables

decisionPack.title: Decision packs you can forward.
bullets: Evidence map: each key variable links to highlight + snippet

security.title: In-region by default. Tenant-isolated for enterprise.
leftBullets: Data locality controls for KSA and in-region operations
Clean audit logs and per-tenant controls

pricing.title: Pricing that matches how teams adopt.

professional.name: Zohal Professional
bullets: Built for individual and growing team workflows

enterprise.name: Zohal Firm Starter
bullets: Core outputs: extraction + memo + obligations tracker + citations
Audit Pack v1: run manifest + hashes + approvals log

enterprise.name: Zohal Firm
bullets: Audit Pack v1 + basic retention window
Shared in-region cloud (dedicated boundary available when required)

enterprise.name: Zohal Firm Plus
bullets: Dedicated tenant boundary included by default (in-region)

usageMeter.title: Usage model
usageMeter.body: Usage is measured in pages processed per year. Example allowances: Starter 50k, Firm 150k, Plus 400k. Overage packs available.

insights.title: Notes from the field.
insights.subhead: Methods, playbooks, and reliability patterns for regulated document work.

items.title: Schema-first workflows: variables, checks, outputs
items.excerpt: How to design templates that stay predictable under uncertainty ‚Äî and scale across teams.

items.title: Generator + Verifier: reducing review without guessing
items.excerpt: Why every claim must be supported by spans + visual grounding ‚Äî and how exceptions keep teams safe.

items.title: Handling Arabic/English scans, stamps, and mixed layouts
items.excerpt: Practical patterns for OCR, layout parsing, and evidence-first extraction in real-world document bundles.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.intro: Don‚Äôt see your question? Contact us.

items.q: How does Zohal keep outputs defensible?
items.a: Zohal produces Verification Objects: structured claims with citations, visual grounding, confidence, and a Provisional ‚Üí Finalized review lifecycle. Unsupported claims become ‚ÄúNot found / unsupported‚Äù and route to exceptions.
Conflicts are surfaced as explicit discrepancy records (e.g., amendment vs master). Reviewers resolve intentionally ‚Äî conflicts are never buried in prose.

items.q: Does Zohal support Arabic and English?
items.a: Yes ‚Äî ingestion, OCR, and layout understanding are designed for bilingual documents and real-world scans.

items.q: Can we control review and approvals?
items.a: Yes ‚Äî assignments, checkpoints, approvals, and version history are built into workflows, so teams can ship reliably.

items.q: How does enterprise tenant isolation work?
items.a: Enterprise deployments use dedicated tenant boundaries with separate storage/database/function scopes and per-tenant audit logs.

contactRow.note: If your questions weren‚Äôt addressed, reach out ‚Äî we‚Äôll respond within 1 business day.

finalCta.title: Turn document chaos into verified work.
finalCta.subhead: Generate decision packs you can forward ‚Äî with evidence.

footer.legalNote: Watd Information Technology Company provides workflow assistance and evidence-backed outputs. Data locality is supported with in-region deployment defaults. Teams remain responsible for review and approvals.

ui.mentalModelLine: Inputs ‚Üí Verified Variables ‚Üí Checks + Exceptions ‚Üí Decision Pack ‚Üí Forward
